themes: racial and gender inequity in funding
economic barriers for Black women writers
risk of erasure of Black women's voices
key_phrases: Literary arts are the least funded of the arts locally and nationally
Torch Literary Arts supports Black women writers
Black feminist led and serving nonprofits receive less than half of one percent of global funding
A third of our community members report annual household incomes of less than $25,000
75% of publishing and literary organizations are white and on the East Coast
our voices and literary contributions are under threat of erasure in Austin
barriers_identified: insufficient funding for Black feminist led and serving nonprofits
low household incomes among community members
lack of local literary organizations serving Black women writers
geographic concentration of literary organizations outside Austin
